post.body: alas won't be able to make it down this avo now. Well looks fantastic.
looks brill, ta. I think if you select things that might work, that'll be a good way to proceed...
just emailed you a first draft...
Yesterday's sonnet didn't happen. But your photo I think might have prompted something. Hold on...
cool, remind me tomorrow.
it's never too late to experience great music. Dive in - http://www.boomkat.com/item.cfm?id=20117
a Shoreditch agency wanting copy-led ideas? It can't be true! All hail etc etc. #tweety6
thankfully only copy. But still, no keywords defined, and wireframes and sitemap not completed. Eeek!
I just add 'RT' in front of what I want to re-post.
Maroon 5? Wild horses wouldn't etc...
hello!
More accurate to say 'Death by No Sonnet'...
just finished the mad men report. It's great; very comprehensive.
it's alright, I didn't see any cliches there. Move along.
do you think we could make that, ahem, 'prisoner swap'? Oh, the cliches...
that's the worry. I was on Maker's Mark last night. And it did no good. Uh-oh. I could be heading towards pill land.
so how come other countries lost and got their trains to work on time, eh?
the former, except I didn't even get to Ox St on the 55 as it was on diversion. Had to walk up from Cambridge Circus.
RT: insomnia. No idea why. No need for Emma's hand to move until the new year, we've been told.
at least you've been to bed! My day started at 3, it appears
thank you!
Let's talk day rates over christmas... ;-)
Ah yes, but comfort. And no motion sickness. I'll take the premium for those.
the train would be easier you know...
think that works. 28th?
yes, we're here apart from Xmas and Boxing day. When were you thinking?
roast chorizo ciabatta from the blackfoot butchers. http://www.theblackfootbutchers.co.uk/
not a big hummus fan, alas, and pancakes just won't do it. Think it might be Blackfoot Butchers for me...
Went on Monday. Can't do it again so soon. And where were you BTW?
start a cupcake business. I have an idea for a brand. I'll come and be your creative director.
not too messy, I think. Left Little Italy at 2...
I think hangover is kicking in now...
Cool, speak to you then. Have a good NYE. x
was thinking Fentiman Arms or the Abbeville? Assuming both/ether is open.
so maybe next week? Or could you squeeze in dinner tomorrow night?
yeah, I hadn't forgotten. When you guys back from the isle?
you're welcome.
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0028333/
Any 26ers in/near Covent Garden: The SpinVox Wishing Well is up. Go have a looksie. And make a wish. #tweety6
Two blur tickets at Hyde Park obtained, thanks to O2 Priority. Ticketmaster however, got 10% service charge on the pair. Ouch.
NME, Private Eye, then bed.
Off to The Diner in Ganton Street in a bit.
... err, but more generally it sorta feels that way. A lot. If it's good enough, people will read it. Honest. #tweety6
Fabric 26: Global Communication. Lovely.
A whole website? In less than a week? Why yes, we'll take that brief! Sorry, I mean 'I'. There goes that sonnet...
SpinVox Wishing Well makes PSFK: http://tinyurl.com/5nb2oe #tweety6
Right, I think I'm done. Now, to go and make a wish.
I can't work out whether I'm bored or not.
RT @countryfeedback: Paul Krugman celebrates Nobel Prize by posting lolcat to blog: http://tinyurl.com/652v4v No, really.
Arrived at work. Lunch before finishing metadata.
London is snarled up in the rain.
insomnia. No idea why. No need for Emma's hand to move until the new year, we've been told.
Past 3am. Can't sleep.
Pub o'clock.
Fame! http://tinyurl.com/6dgtql
Trying to clear the decks, to accommodate the onslaught of work in the next few days.
American Analog Set: glorious stuff
Pub then home. Or maybe just home. Not sure which yet.
Oh Lordy, on the wave of work goes...
So... will I get everything done today? Here goes...
Ladyhawke on the ipod. People look at me funny while i groove.
Off to Chez Gerrard to celebrate the SpinVox Wishing Well.
Am starting to flag now...
What's a good hangover lunch?
Roadrunner, roadrunner. Radio on.
Bloody Mary is having a restorative effect...
OK, off to Ruislip, NW London for NYE. If I don't see you, have a good start to 2009 twitterverse.
Batter for tonight's toad made.
And now... to the tip!
The v and a is surprisingly quiet.
Off to the V&A now.
Wi-fi is sloooooooooow this morning.
Leg hurts. Cough back. Time for bed, and some Berlin Noir.
Another clearout completed. Hopefully, now all is in place for the New Year.
Baby, it's cold. In, as well as outside.
New Canon ixus 80 has arrived. Waiting for battery to charge.
Looks like there could be wi-fi in the spare room again!
A very slow start to Tuesday.
Anyone know what the 'literature of social reflection is'? Don't rush - answers can wait until the morn'.
It's cold out there. And there's no decent bread. As recompense, time for 'Swing Time'.
